<a:chart width="500" height="400" anim="10">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-10" 
                  y1    = "-10" 
                  x2    = "10" 
                  y2    = "10">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane  {fill:white;stroke:#ebebeb};
                        tiles  {fill:#eeeeee;stroke:#ebebeb;};
                        margin {left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0}
                        layout {onaxisx:1;onaxisy:1;}
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "x*x/10">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : #00aeef;
                            weight      : 1;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 0.9;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "-1*x*x/10">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : #8dc63f;
                            weight      : 1;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 0.9;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                 </a:axis>
            </a:chart>

<a:chart width="500" height="400" anim="10">
                <a:axis 
                  mode  = "2D"
                  x1    = "-2" 
                  y1    = "-3" 
                  x2    = "6" 
                  y2    = "3">
                    <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                        plane  {fill:white;stroke:gray};
                        tiles  {fill:#eeeeee;stroke:gray;};
                        margin {left:0;top:0;right:0;bottom:0}
                        layout {onaxisx:1;onaxisy:1;}
                    </a:style>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "sin(x*(1+a)+(1+a)*cos(x-2*n)*(1+a)+n)*cos(2*x+n)*2">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : blue;
                            weight      : 2;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 1;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                    <a:graph 
                      mode      = "line" 
                      dataslice = "1X"
                      formula   = "sin(2*x*(1+a)-cos(x+n)*(1+3*a)-2*n)*cos(x+n)">
                        <a:style type="text/chartcss">
                          graph {
                            fill        : red;
                            weight      : 2;
                            fillopacity : 0.5;
                            fillout     : 1;
                          }
                        </a:style>
                    </a:graph>
                </a:axis>
            </a:chart>
